name: 2014 Remove TVGuide Listings Junk
description: Removes ads and much of the excess navigation from the TVGuide.com Listings.  Works on the new TVGuide layout as of 26 Feb 2014.  (Sorry if my CSS isn't ideal; I did what worked to get rid of ads and reduce vertical space.)  Updated on 05 Mar 2014 after TVGuide changed something.
additional_info:
To remove specific channels, add either the channel number or channel source to the top list of classes/ids to hide (replace the part in quotes to your channel number or source (look at the HTML source to see the value for source)):

,li[data-channel-number="65"]
,li[data-channel-source="22389"]
